00001 /***************************************************************************/
00075 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00076 
00077 typedef enum {
00078     JRErrorCodeType_Unknown,
00079     JRErrorCodeType_Cocoa,          //  "@"
00080     JRErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach,    //  "i" (-1 == posix+errno, otherwise mach)
00081     JRErrorCodeType_Carbon,         //  "s" || "l"
00082     JRErrorCodeType_errstr          //  "r*" || "*"
00083 }   JRErrorCodeType;
00084 
00085 //--
00086 
00087 #define errorCodeTypeFromObjCType(objCType)                                                     \
00088     ({                                                                                          \
00089         JRErrorCodeType result;                                                                 \
00090         switch (objCType[0]) {                                                                  \
00091             case 's':                                                                           \
00092             case 'l':                                                                           \
00093                 result = JRErrorCodeType_Carbon;                                                \
00094                 break;                                                                          \
00095             case 'i':                                                                           \
00096                 result = JRErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach;                                           \
00097                 break;                                                                          \
00098             case '@':                                                                           \
00099                 result = JRErrorCodeType_Cocoa;                                                 \
00100                 break;                                                                          \
00101             case '*':                                                                           \
00102                 result = JRErrorCodeType_errstr;                                                \
00103                 break;                                                                          \
00104             case 'r':                                                                           \
00105                 result = '*' == objCType[1] ? JRErrorCodeType_errstr : JRErrorCodeType_Unknown; \
00106                 break;                                                                          \
00107             default:                                                                            \
00108                 result = JRErrorCodeType_Unknown;                                               \
00109         }                                                                                       \
00110         result;                                                                                 \
00111     })
00112 
00113 //--
00114 
00115 #define NSXReturnError(CODE)    \
00116     {   \
00117         typeof(CODE) codeResult = (CODE);   \
00118         if ('@' == @encode(typeof(codeResult))[0]) {    \
00119             if (nil == codeResult) {    \
00120                 error = [NSError errorWithDomain:@"NSCocoaErrorDomain"  \
00121                                             code:-1 \
00122                                         userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:    \
00123                                             [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__FILE__],   @"reportingFile",   \
00124                                             [NSNumber numberWithInt:__LINE__],   @"reportingLine",  \
00125                                             [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__PRETTY_FUNCTION__], @"reportingMethod",    \
00126                                             @#CODE, @"origin",  \
00127                                             nil]];  \
00128             }   \
00129         } else {    \
00130             if (0 != codeResult) {  \
00131                 switch (errorCodeTypeFromObjCType(@encode(typeof(CODE)))) { \
00132                     case JRErrorCodeType_Carbon:    \
00133                         error = [NSError errorWithDomain:NSOSStatusErrorDomain  \
00134                                                     code:(int)codeResult    \
00135                                                 userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:    \
00136                                                     [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__FILE__],   @"reportingFile",   \
00137                                                     [NSNumber numberWithInt:__LINE__],   @"reportingLine",  \
00138                                                     [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__PRETTY_FUNCTION__], @"reportingMethod",    \
00139                                                     @#CODE, @"origin",  \
00140                                                     nil]];  \
00141                         break;  \
00142                     case JRErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach:   \
00143                         if (-1 == (int)codeResult) {    \
00144                             error = [NSError errorWithDomain:NSPOSIXErrorDomain \
00145                                                         code:errno  \
00146                                                     userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:    \
00147                                                         [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__FILE__],   @"reportingFile",   \
00148                                                         [NSNumber numberWithInt:__LINE__],   @"reportingLine",  \
00149                                                         [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__PRETTY_FUNCTION__], @"reportingMethod",    \
00150                                                         @#CODE, @"origin",  \
00151                                                         nil]];  \
00152                         } else {    \
00153                             error = [NSError errorWithDomain:NSMachErrorDomain  \
00154                                                         code:(int)codeResult    \
00155                                                     userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:    \
00156                                                         [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__FILE__],   @"reportingFile",   \
00157                                                         [NSNumber numberWithInt:__LINE__],   @"reportingLine",  \
00158                                                         [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__PRETTY_FUNCTION__], @"reportingMethod",    \
00159                                                         @#CODE, @"origin",  \
00160                                                         nil]];  \
00161                         }   \
00162                         break;  \
00163                     case JRErrorCodeType_errstr:    \
00164                         error = [NSError errorWithDomain:@"errstr"  \
00165                                                     code:-1 \
00166                                                 userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:    \
00167                                                     [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__FILE__],   @"reportingFile",   \
00168                                                     [NSNumber numberWithInt:__LINE__],   @"reportingLine",  \
00169                                                     [NSString stringWithUTF8String:__PRETTY_FUNCTION__], @"reportingMethod",    \
00170                                                     @#CODE, @"origin",  \
00171                                                     [NSString stringWithUTF8String:(const char*)(intptr_t)codeResult], @"errstr",   \
00172                                                     nil]];  \
00173                         break;  \
00174                     default:    \
00175                         assert(0 && "unknown JRErrorCodeType"); \
00176                         break;  \
00177                 }   \
00178             }   \
00179         }   \
00180     }
00181 
00182 #define NSXThrowError(CODE) \
00183     {   \
00184         NSError *error = nil;   \
00185         NSXReturnError(CODE);   \
00186         if (error) {    \
00187             [[NSException exceptionWithName:@"NSError"  \
00188                                      reason:[error description] \
00189                                    userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObject:error forKey:@"error"]] raise];  \
00190         }   \
00191     }
